title: Sueños de libertad
overview: Year 1958. Begoña Montes flees through the forest with little Julia, her stepdaughter. Begoña is the new wife of Jesús de la Reina, the golden widower of the region, owner of an important toiletry products company, Perfumerías de la Reina. Begoña runs with the girl, when Jesús catches up with them and shoots them in cold blood. Has he hurt Begoña? What happened to make Jesus lose his mind and shoot his own wife?
